Text:
SD DATA is the same as v1.0, found here:
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7900559/

"XAPK file validation failed" on launch.

SD data from 1.0 is in place in sdcardAndroidobbcom.rockstargames.gtavc

The APK from 1.0 from the mentioned torrent plays fine.

Any ideas?
"XAPK file validation failed" on my SII

even though it is exactly the same file, try renaming main.7.com.rockstargames.gtavc.obb
to main.11.com.rockstargames.gtavc.obb
the folder name does not change

Awesome, thanks! Will try it when I get home.

How did you determine the correct folder name? I'm brand new to Android and trying to learn. Thanks!
Renaming the resource file did the trick. Thank you!
Ive tried all the mentioned tips, and the game is still freezing when I get into a car. I'm using a Galaxy SII, can anyone give me some advice on what to do? Thanks
Freezing when getting into a car on SII's is a widely reported issue on google play. I see they have already put up version 1.02 to address this.
yeah, i saw the new version and downloaded the apk, its still freezing. thanks for your reply.
